test.name: Quest X
test.instructions_html:
Welcome to the Quiz

Please read all instructions carefully:

  • You will have a tutorial quiz first
  • Then you'll take the main graded quiz
  • Do not switch tabs - your quiz will auto-submit if you switch 3 times
  • Answer each question carefully within the time limit
  • After completing, you'll receive your certificate and detailed results
test.consent_text: I agree to the terms and conditions of this assessment.
test.end_message_html:

certificate.subtitle: Certificate of Achievement
certificate.paragraph1: This certificate is awarded to the respondent for successfully completing the assessment.
